summary: This is an FBI intake document dated September 23, 2021, summarizing a call from a victim to the FBI National Threat Operations Center. The victim reports being sexually assaulted and trafficked by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in the mid-1990s in New York and Florida, detailing multiple specific assaults and the coercive tactics used by the pair.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a perpetrator who, along with Ghislaine Maxwell, sexually assaulted and trafficked the victim in the mid-1990s.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a perpetrator who recruited, befriended, and then facilitated the victim's assaults by Jeffrey Epstein and others in the mid-1990s.

persons.name: Mr. Wexler
persons.context: A person the victim was introduced to by Maxwell at a hotel bar prior to an assault; his specific role is not detailed.

connections.description: Acted together to recruit, assault, and traffic the victim; Maxwell used terms like 'boyfriend' and 'boss' for Epstein.
Maxwell arranged for the victim to meet Mr. Wexler at a hotel bar.

events.title: Victim meets Maxwell and Epstein
events.description: The victim, then a student and worker, met Ghislaine Maxwell as a client and was later introduced to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: First assault
events.description: The victim was first assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in a hotel room after being lured there under false pretenses.

events.title: Second assault
events.description: The victim was assaulted a second time at an unspecified location.

events.title: New Year's Eve party assault
events.description: After being convinced to dump her boyfriend and attend a New Year's Eve party, the victim was raped by Maxwell, Epstein, and her date, causing her to flee the hotel.

events.title: Florida trafficking trip
events.description: The victim traveled to Florida at the request of Maxwell and Epstein and was raped by them and several of their friends, being trafficked under the guise of being set up with friends.

events.title: Involvement ends
events.description: The victim's involvement with Maxwell and Epstein ended due to a nervous breakdown, after which she moved three times to get away from them.

events.title: FBI report filed
events.description: The victim called the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report being a victim of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A victim reported to the FBI in 2021 that she was sexually assaulted and trafficked by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in the mid-1990s.
The victim details a pattern of coercion, starting with a fake job offer, and escalating to multiple assaults in New York and a trafficking trip to Florida in January 1996.
The victim states she was raped by Epstein, Maxwell, and others at a New Year's Eve party and during the Florida trip, where she was trafficked to their friends.
The victim's involvement ended in late 1996 or 1997 after a nervous breakdown, prompting her to move three times to escape them.
The victim's name and specific workplace/school are redacted in the document.
